scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --names "BE,FE" -c "bgYellow.bold,bgBlue.bold" "cd apps/be && npm run start:debug" "cd apps/fe && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently --kill-others --names "BE,FE" -c "bgYellow.bold,bgBlue.bold" "cd apps/be && npm run build" "cd apps/fe && npm run build"
scripts.lint: concurrently --kill-others --names "BE,FE" -c "bgYellow.bold,bgBlue.bold" "cd apps/be && npm run lint" "cd apps/fe && npm run lint"
